name: Die Stamped
description:
This game is kind of a buggy mess sorry. 
I wasn't having fun with my initial game so I changed ideas in the last 6 hours of the jam.

Beat up as many red dice as possible by bumping into them with a higher number, but watch out! Killing a die leaves behind a stamp that will impede your ability to move around the map.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • R to Reset
  • Esc to quit out (Exe version)
